MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L18 area of Liverpool affecting properties in Glenside, Keswick Road, Booker Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:00am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20am on 2nd March 2021
